column2: The Way I Am (Danny Lohner Remix)
column3: eminem dre just let it run ayo turn the beat up a little bit ayo this song is for anyone fuck it just shut up and listen ayo   eminem i sit back with this pack of zigzag's and this bag of works and it sells and it helps in itself to relieve all this tension dispensing these sentences getting this stress that's been eating me recently off of this chest and i rest again peacefully but at
